Dummy instrument a implementation of a dummy instrument

is_connected¶

check if instrument is active and connected and return True in that case :return: bool

read_probes(key)[source]¶

requestes value from the instrument and returns it :param key: name of requested value

Returns: reads values from instrument

update(settings)[source]¶

updates the internal dictionary and sends changed values to instrument :param settings: parameters to be set

# mabe in the future: # Returns: boolean that is true if update successful
